chapter.title: Setting the Stage - Movies Domain
chapter.para: The domain model was the next thing I planned to work on. I wanted to flesh it out first before diving into library details. Going along the ideas outlined before I came up with this. I also peeked in the datamodel of my import data source themoviedb to confirm that it matched my expectations.
In Java code this looked like. Pretty straightforward.
I wrote some basic tests to assure that the basic plumbing worked. Check.
